[93mdiseases[0m, but the [93misoform[0m-[93mspecific[0m [93meffects[0m [93mremain[0m [93mpoorly[0m [93munderstood[0m. [93mHypochlorous[0m [93macid[0m ([93mHOCl[0m), [93munknown[0m. [93mMethods[0m: [93mWe[0m [95minvestigated[0m the [93meffects[0m of [93mHOCl[0m and [93mMPO[0m-[93mderived[0m [93moxidants[0m on [93mtwo[0m [93mhuman[0m [93mTE[0m [93misoforms[0m, [93mTE2[0m and [93mTE6[0m. [93mOxidative[0m [93mmodifications[0m were [93manalyzed[0m [93musing[0m [93mhigh[0m-[93mresolution[0m [93mLC[0m-[93mMS[0m/[93mMS[0m, with [93msite[0m-[93mspecific[0m [93midentification[0m of [93mchlorinated[0m [93mtyrosines[0m and [93moxidized[0m [93mcysteine[0m [93mresidues[0m. [93mexhibited[0m [93mchlorination[0m at [93mmultiple[0m [93mtyrosine[0m [93mresidues[0m, [93mparticularly[0m [93m3[0m,[93m5[0m-[93mdichlorotyrosine[0m, while [93mshowing[0m These [93misoform[0m-[93mspecific[0m [93mpatterns[0m [93mtranslated[0m into [93mfunctional[0m [93mdifferences[0m: [93mTE2[0m [93mdemonstrated[0m [93menhanced[0m [93mcoacervation[0m , [93mwhereas[0m [93mTE6[0m [93mshowed[0m [93mreduced[0m [93massembly[0m [93mcapacity[0m, [93mconsistent[0m with [93mstructural[0m [93mdestabilization[0m. [93mConclusion[0m: [93mHOCl[0m and [93mMPO[0m-[93mderived[0m [93moxidants[0m [93minduce[0m [93mdistinct[0m [93mmodifications[0m in [93mtropoelastin[0m [93misoforms[0m, [93mresulting[0m in [93mdivergent[0m [93meffects[0m on [93mprotein[0m [93mself[0m-[93massembly[0m. The [93mutilization[0m of [93mcopper[0m [93mcatalysis[0m [93msuccessfully[0m [93mrealized[0m the [93mracemization[0m of [93mbis[0m-([93mhetero[0m)-[93marenols[0m under [93maerobic[0m [93mconditions[0m, which was [93malso[0m [93mcompatible[0m with [93menzyme[0m [93mcatalysis[0m, [93mendowing[0m the [93mchemoenzymatic[0m [93mDKR[0m with [93mhigh[0m [93mefficiency[0m and [93mselectivity[0m.
